page.title: 19Housing in Otley (2)
page.content: Most houses in Otley were built in the 19 and 20th centuries,but there many buildings in the town centre dating from the 17 and 18th centuries,these now house various buisness premises.Otley has terraces,semi's,detached,bungalows,fla ts,council property,farmhouses and some large mansions.All the older property is built of stone. Otley has High density_Terraced Medium density_semi's,Council Low density_Large detached The most expensive houses are on Riverside,the cheapest houses are the older houses in the Cambridge area. Houses price in 1985 in Otley range from Â£12.000_Â£80.000 and even beyond for houses standing in a lot of ground just outside the town.
